data.title: Inception
data.synopsis: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

instructions: Append ' - A mind-bending thriller' to the synopsis.

ground_truth.title: Inception
ground_truth.synopsis: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O. - A mind-bending thriller

modification: The synopsis was modified to include '- A mind-bending thriller'.
